name: Star Flipper
description:
Take control of the ball inside a pinball-themed world! Star Flipper is a little 1v1 racing game where you can play with physics and with whoever can race you to the end of the 12 levels! (including 3 tutorial levels)

Use the left stick and top right trigger of you controller to impulse your ball towards a direction, and let the pinball obstacles decide your trajectory for you.

Or, you can put your skill at test with the tilt, push the right stick towards a direction to activate reactors that change your trajectory on the fly.

Reach the end of a level to increase your score, and whoever has the higher score at the end wins!
